page.title: 18Computers in Schools.
page.content: Most schools now have at least one microcomputer. They have been introduced gradually over the past three or four years. Our school, (Cumberlands Middle) has four BBC Microcomputers each with disc drives for storage. We have two colour monitors and two green monochrome monitors. We also have a BBC Buggy which is a small robot device which can be controlled by the computer and an AMX Mouse which makes drawing pictures on the screen very easy. The schools computers tend to be used mainly in Maths lessons but they are also used in other subjects - such as this survey.
